extendedInfo.description: Write your own Android apps! Basic4android makes it easy!Use the fabulously easy Basic programming language.This app is an example of what Basic4android can do, written in about a minute!B4a is the only programming language that I know of written exclusively for Android.You can do everything that Java/Eclipse can do but so much easier.No limitations, your apps compile to apk files ready to be sold online!If you have any problems then the online community are the friendliest bunch of people ready to help you.This app is just an ad for B4a which will, if you press the button, open your web browser and take you to a page on my web forum which describes how you can get big discounts off B4a, possibly more than 50% off!

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: The app does exactly what you said it would do. So simple to use - just one _click!   Honestly, anyone looking to create World Class Android apps shouldn\'t waste anymore time looking anywhere else. I found this product 2 years ago and am amazed as to how far it has evolved.    The authors product is one small project ( I mean awesome ) created with B4A.
reviews.author: Mike Whetmore
